name: Pact Lich
description: The Pact Lich is a sinister figure with an exceptional Charisma, often cloaked in dark robes, emanating a commanding presence. It has a malevolent aura and unnatural movements, blending into shadows effortlessly.
memorable: Its ability to manipulate shadows and the psychological torment it inflicts through its Maddening Touch makes it a terrifying foe.
goals: To dominate and control its enemies, often using spellcasting to instill fear and inflict harm for its patron.
relations: Often serves a powerful patron in the lower planes, and may command lesser undead or fiends.
environment: Typically found in dark, arcane locations, such as ancient tombs, ruins, or shadowy lairs.
strengths: Highly resilient to many conditions, possesses strong spellcasting abilities and can regain spells through legendary actions.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage and can be temporarily hindered by effects disrupting spellcasting.
attacks: Utilizes four enhanced Eldritch Blast attacks that deal force damage and can push targets, as well as its Maddening Touch that induces debilitating hallucinations.
most_powerful_ability: Hurl Through Hell can paralyze a target and deal significant psychic damage upon their return, creating both psychological and physical peril.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 120 ft., allowing it to see through illusions and invisibility.
skills: Excels in deception and persuasion, making it a potent manipulator in social situations.
additional_information: Inherent immortality through Pact Rejuvenation if conditions are met.
Can become invisible in dim light or darkness, enhancing its stealth.
Gains temporary hit points upon reducing enemies to zero hit points.
Strong saving throws in Dexterity and Intelligence, allowing it to avoid danger effectively.
Has various powerful spells that can control and damage its foes, increasing battlefield control.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting ability with a range of powerful spells including banishment and finger of death.
test_queries: lich that can drive you insane
creature that uses shadows and hallucinations
